bioghist.p: Hershel Herzog was an expert in steroid drug research who worked for Schering Corporation. He and his wife Levonna started their own consulting firm, L & H Herzog Associates. Herzog made several trips to China between the late 1970s and 1990 to consult with the China National Corporation of Pharmaceutical Industries regarding technical processes for cortico-steriod production.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of materials relating to Herzog's steroid research and his consulting work. Records include correspondence, lectures, slides, diaries and notes from several of his trips to China, a report on the production of corticoids, his doctoral thesis and notes, American and German patents, framed photographs and diplomas, lab notebooks, and a print block.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
